sentences.en: Hearn fastened the vine about his belt, and stepped out into the rapids.
sentences.cn: 俟思把藤索在腰里系好, 闯进激流.

sentences.en: His canoe was there, on the river below the rapids.
sentences.cn: 他的独木舟在险滩下面的河水中。

sentences.en: Only a shallow boat can shoot this stretch of the rapids.
sentences.cn: 只有浅身船只才可穿过这片急流.
独木舟飞速地冲入急流.

sentences.en: The force of the rapids had been terrifying.
sentences.cn: 这道激流水势实在厉害.

sentences.en: The rapids near this town bring difficulties for canal makers.
sentences.cn: 这个镇附近的急流给运河建造者带来了麻烦.

sentences.en: The Rhosili is a turbulent , swift - flowing river, full of dangerous rapids and currents.
sentences.cn: 罗西里是一条汹涌的迅速滚滚的河, 充满着危险的险滩和湍流.

sentences.en: The river brawled over the rapids.
They came to another rapids which was too rocky, too swift to be crossed on foot.
sentences.cn: 他们前面又是一道激流,那里的岩石之多, 水流之急,要靠两只脚涉水而过是不可能的.

sentences.en: They shot some pretty weirs and rapids.
sentences.cn: 他们看到了一些美丽的堰坎和湍滩.

sentences.en: They shot the rapids in a canoe.
sentences.cn: 他们乘小舟冲过了急流.

sentences.en: They were in full rapids now, the water solid white and tearing them toward the falls.
sentences.cn: 这时他们已经到了激流中心, 滚滚白浪把他们朝着瀑布推去.

sentences.en: We portaged our gear around the rapids.
sentences.cn: 我们把装备转由陆上运输以绕过湍滩.

sentences.en: With him at the helm, we are a hundred percent safe crossing these treacherous rapids.
sentences.cn: 由他掌舵, 通过这段激流险滩是万无一失的.

phrases.tran_cn: 锡达拉皮兹市（美国城市）
大急流城（美国密歇根州西南部城市）

trans.tran_en: part of a river where the water looks white because it is moving very fast over rocks
